des:
Easily control your Şımart Technology products with voice. By linking through the Şımart app, enjoy managing all your smart devices at home with voice commands. Simplify your daily life and take home automation to the next level.

Linking Steps:
Open the Şımart app and add your devices.
Open the Amazon Alexa app and go to the "Skills & Games" section.
Search for "Şımart" Skill and select it.
Click on the "Enable to Use" button and log in with your Şımart account to authorize.
Let Alexa discover your devices and integrate your Şımart products.

Voice Instructions:
To control your devices with voice commands, simply give instructions to Alexa. For example:
"Alexa, turn on my Şımart air purifier."
"Alexa, set Şımart lights to blue."
"Alexa, adjust my Şımart thermostat to 24 degrees."
